duties_responsibilities.duty: Carry out laboratory tasks and experiments related to semiconducting carbon nanotubes (CNTs) for computational and communication devices.
Fabricate samples for testing and prepare summary reports on lab samples and results.
Oversee test equipment operation, interpret and validate results.
Compile, tabulate, and curate materials parameters, characterization results, and device performance data.
Communicate with the technical team and adhere to SixLine’s EHS policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Minimum BS in Engineering or Chemistry; engineering major in Chemical, Materials, Mechanical, or Electrical Engineering preferred.
